org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Interface IBasicStorage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IObsStorage, IObsStorageModule<ConfigType>, IRecordStorageModule<ConfigType>

    public interface IBasicStorage

    Storage for one or more data streams coming from a single source. (for instance, the source can be a sensor, a service or a process)
    This also supports storing lineage information if a description of the data source is provided.

    Since:
    Nov 27, 2014

      • getLatestDataSourceDescription

        AbstractProcess getLatestDataSourceDescription()
        Retrieves latest data source description (i.e. most recent version)
        Returns:
        SensorML process description

      • getDataSourceDescriptionHistory

        java.util.List<AbstractProcess> getDataSourceDescriptionHistory(double startTime,
                                                                double endTime)
        Retrieves history of data source description for the given time period
        Parameters:
        startTime - lower bound of the time period
        endTime - upper bound of the time period
        Returns:
        list of SensorML process descriptions (with disjoint time validity periods)

      • getDataSourceDescriptionAtTime

        AbstractProcess getDataSourceDescriptionAtTime(double time)
        Retrieves data source description valid at specified time
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:
        SensorML process description

      • storeDataSourceDescription

        void storeDataSourceDescription(AbstractProcess process)
        Stores a new data source description into storage. Validity period must not overlap with existing descriptions
        Parameters:
        process - SensorML process description to store

      • updateDataSourceDescription

        void updateDataSourceDescription(AbstractProcess process)
        Update the data source description in storage. Validity period must be exactly the same as one in storage
        Parameters:
        process - SensorML process description to update

      • removeDataSourceDescription

        void removeDataSourceDescription(double time)
        Removes data source description valid at specified time
        Parameters:
        time - any time falling within the validity period of the description version to remove

      • removeDataSourceDescriptionHistory

        void removeDataSourceDescriptionHistory(double startTime,
                                        double endTime)
        Removes data source descriptions whose validity periods lie within the given time period
        Parameters:
        startTime - lower bound of the time period
        endTime - upper bound of the time period

      • getRecordStores

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends IRecordStoreInfo> getRecordStores()
        Gets the list of available record types in this storage
        Returns:
        map of name to data store instance

      • addRecordStore

        void addRecordStore(java.lang.String name,
                    DataComponent recordStructure,
                    DataEncoding recommendedEncoding)
        Adds a data store for a new record type in this storage
        Parameters:
        name - name of record type (should match output name of the data source)
        recordStructure - SWE data component describing the record structure
        recommendedEncoding - recommended encoding for this record type

      • getNumRecords

        int getNumRecords(java.lang.String recordType)
        Helper method to retrieve the total number of method for the specified record type
        Parameters:
        recordType - name of record type
        Returns:
        total number of records

      • getRecordsTimeRange

        double[] getRecordsTimeRange(java.lang.String recordType)
        Retrieves time range spanned by all records of the specified type
        Parameters:
        recordType - name of record type
        Returns:
        array of length 2 in the form [minTime maxTime] or [NaN NaN] if no records of this type are available

      • getEstimatedRecordCounts

        int[] getEstimatedRecordCounts(java.lang.String recordType,
                               double[] timeStamps)
        Retrieves record counts within bins defined by the given time stamps. Each bin is defined by two consecutive time stamps.
        Parameters:
        recordType - name of record type
        timeStamps -
        Returns:

      • getDataBlock

        DataBlock getDataBlock(DataKey key)
        Retrieves raw data block with the specified key
        Parameters:
        key - Record key
        Returns:
        data block or null if no record with the specified key was found

      • getDataBlockIterator

        java.util.Iterator<DataBlock> getDataBlockIterator(IDataFilter filter)
        Gets iterator of raw data blocks matching the specified filter
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        Returns:
        A read-only iterator among data blocks matching the filter

      • getRecordIterator

        java.util.Iterator<? extends IDataRecord> getRecordIterator(IDataFilter filter)
        Gets iterator of records matching the specified filter
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        Returns:
        A read-only iterator among records matching the filter

      • getNumMatchingRecords

        int getNumMatchingRecords(IDataFilter filter,
                          long maxCount)
        Computes the (potentially approximate) number of records matching the given filter.
        Since the returned value can be approximate and the number of matching records can change before or even during the actual call to getRecordIterator(IDataFilter), the exact number of records can only be obtained by counting the records returned by the iterator next() function.
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        maxCount - counting will stop once this threshold is reached
        Returns:
        number of matching records

      • storeRecord

        void storeRecord(DataKey key,
                 DataBlock data)
        Persists data block in storage
        Parameters:
        key - key object to associate to record
        data - actual record data

      • updateRecord

        void updateRecord(DataKey key,
                  DataBlock data)
        Updates record with specified key with new data
        Parameters:
        key - key of record to update
        data - new data block to assign to the record

      • removeRecord

        void removeRecord(DataKey key)
        Removes record with the specified key
        Parameters:
        key - record key

      • removeRecords

        int removeRecords(IDataFilter filter)
        Removes all records matching the filter
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        Returns:
        number of deleted records

      • isReadSupported

        boolean isReadSupported()
        Returns:
        true if read operations are supported by this storage, false otherwise

      • isWriteSupported

        boolean isWriteSupported()
        Returns:
        true if write operations are supported by this storage, false otherwise
